How reach me:
rafael.barbosa [at] encs.eu
I am Brazilian born in Vila Velha, Espírito Santo. Currently, I work as a Data Scientist and Engineer at 3D Hubs. I have my Ph.D degree from the University of Twente, working at the Design and Analysis of Communication Systems group. My thesis is entitled Anomaly Detection in SCADA Systems - A Network Based approach. In 2009, I received my M.Sc. in Telematics from the same University. Back in Brazil, I received my bachelor degree in 2007 from the Federal University of Espírito Santo (UFES).

Based on Simply Grey and hushaw.
